name: nativescript-imagecropper
description: A image cropper based on TOCropViewController for iOS and uCrop for Android

scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-imagecropper && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: cd demo && npm install && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo; cd demo; tns deploy ios --emulator --justlaunch
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android

author: bthurlow
